page.title: 16SHILLINGFORD-HOUSING
page.content: ALPHINGTON RESIDENTIAL AREA IS MADE UP OF THE ORIGINAL STONE AND BRICK BUILT HOUSES,AND THATCHED COTTAGES WHICH LINE THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH THE VILLAGE, AND SEVERAL NEW HOUSING ESTATES,CONSISTING OF ATTRACTIVE RED BRICK HOUSING WITH TILED ROOFS INTERMINGLED WITH NEW HOUSES.THERE ARE AREAS OF GRASS AND TREES,WHICH PROVIDE RECREATION AREA FOR THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE AND A PLACE FOR THE ELDERLY TO SIT AND ENJOY THE FRESH AIR. THIS PART OF ALPHINGTON IS SERVED BY SEVERAL SHOPS INCLUDING A BUTCHERS. THE HOUSES IN ALPHINGTON ARE PROCTECTED FROM THE WORST OF THE WEATHER AND THE PREVAILING WINDS BY THE SURROUNDING HOLDEN HILLS. THE BUSHES AND FLOWERS IN PEOPLES GARDENS ARE WELL KEPT AND MAKE ALPHINGTON A VERY ATTRACTIVE VILLAGE.
